introduction.title: The Crow Queen
introduction.tagline: All land bends. All flesh kneels.
introduction.description: Once the absolute ruler of Monstru, the Crow Queen—now called the Regent Black—was deposed by a monster uprising so vulgar it still offends her sense of order. Stripped of her throne but not her divinity of will, she fled with her Inner Court into exile, bearing crowns without kingdoms and laws without land. In Coffin Canyon, she has found not refuge, but provocation. Here, she consecrates dust into demesne, collars monsters into obedience, and grinds manlings beneath the heel of remembered sovereignty. The Canyon does not yet know it kneels—but it will.
introduction.philosophy: Order is not debated. It is declared. Hierarchy is not cruel—it is natural, and the Regent Black stands at its apex by undeniable right. Monsters are instruments, humans are livestock, and land exists only to be named, measured, and ruled.
introduction.history: The fall of Monstru shattered the Crow Court, but it did not erase it. Loyal servants followed their Queen into exile, carrying relics of authority, ledgers of blood-debt, and rites that bind stone and soil to command. Coffin Canyon is not a hiding place—it is a proving ground.

units.name: The Regent Black

ability_descriptions.Sovereign Presence: The Regent projects authority. She generates Consecrated Ground in a 12" radius.
ability_descriptions.Unquestioned Rule: Friendly units within range may ignore one failed Morale check per round.
ability_descriptions.Hierarchy of Flesh: Enemy units that become Shaken within Consecrated Ground suffer an additional penalty.
ability_descriptions.Immune to Shaken and Broken: This unit never gains Shaken or Broken.
ability_descriptions.Crown of Unanswered Law: Enemy units within Sovereign Presence suffer −1 to Morale checks.
ability_descriptions.Throne Without Walls: The Regent Black is always considered to be within Consecrated Ground for the purposes of her own abilities and effects, regardless of terrain or marker placement. This does not generate Consecrated Ground for other units.

units.lore: The Crow Queen herself—calm, immaculate, and absolute.
units.tactics: Anchor and protect. The faction collapses if she falls.

units.name: Ladies in Waiting

ability_descriptions.Ritual Comfort: Remove Shaken from an allied unit within 6".
ability_descriptions.Veiled Whispers: Once per game, impose Shaken on an enemy within 6".

optional_upgrades.name: Sweet Cakes
optional_upgrades.effect: Once per game: Remove Shaken within 6"

units.lore: Silent court attendants bearing banners and poison.

ability_descriptions.Marked Prey: Designate a target to suffer penalties.
ability_descriptions.Queen’s Arrow: Once per game, a hit automatically causes Shaken.

units.name: Dark Skald

ability_descriptions.Ivory Chord: Enemies treat Consecrated Ground as difficult terrain.

optional_upgrades.name: Ivory Strings
optional_upgrades.effect: May move and use Courtly Refrain in the same activation.

units.lore: A skald whose music enforces law.

ability_descriptions.Walking Writ of Law: Counts as Consecrated Ground in a 6" radius.
ability_descriptions.Mustard Exhalation: Once per round, deploy a gas hazard.
ability_descriptions.Attention of the Crown: Enemies must target this unit if able.

optional_upgrades.name: Expanded Gas Reservoirs
optional_upgrades.effect: Mustard Exhalation may be used twice per round.
